content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(12.93, 10.71)
Consists of the following entities:
- Electricity group (position 12.93, 10.71) - Status: NOT_PLUGGED_IN_ELECTRIC_NETWORK

### Copper plate mine at position(0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS
- Furnace (position 0.0, 0.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS

### Copper plate factory at position(2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position 2.0, 0.0) - Status: WORKING
- Furnace (position 2.0, 0.0) - Status: WORKING

### Iron plate factory at position(2, 2)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position 2.0, 2.0) - Status: NO_INGREDIENTS

### Lab at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Lab (position 10.5, 10.5) - Status: NO_POWER

### Wooden chest at position(5.5, 0.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden chest (position 5.5, 0.5) - Status: NORMAL

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to access entities that do not exist
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to access is placed on the map and is of the correct type. For example, the error encountered when trying to get the lab at position (6.0, 0.0) indicates that no lab was found at that position.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
